ca.ualberta.appfive

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.appfive.AppController

  • public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    App Controller calls for methods of the AppFive model The methods includes getters and setters from various sub-models. Sub-models include User Profile and Book details.

        public void addBook(Book book)
        This method adds a book to the ElasticSearch database. It adds this book to the local data as well.
        Parameters:
        book - New book to be added

      • deleteBook

        public void deleteBook(int index)
        This method deletes a book from local data and from the ElasticSearch database
        Parameters:
        index - Index of book in list to be deleted

      • editBook

        public void editBook(int index,
                     Book newBook,
                     int list)
        This method edits a book. It makes the changes locally and in the ElasticSearch database.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of book to be edited
        newBook - The book object to replace the existing book
        list - 0 if it is owned by the current user

      • isUserInDataBase

        public java.lang.Boolean isUserInDataBase(java.lang.String userName)
        This method tests to see if the given username is in the ElasticSearch database.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username to be tested
        Returns:
        True if the username is currently in the database, false if it is not
